contributionDescription: I am part of the optimism community, many of my friends are also part of the community by becoming holders. We hope that in the future the coin price will increase and we will be very happy. Hopefully in 2024 things will improve for the crypto world.
impactDescription: I am part of the optimism community, many of my friends are also part of the community by becoming holders. We hope that in the future the coin price will increase and we will be very happy. Hopefully in 2024 things will improve for the crypto world.
pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged for violating rule 1: promises of future impact are not allowed. The applicant states "We hope that in the future the coin price will increase and we will be very happy. Hopefully in 2024 things will improve for the crypto world." which is a clear violation of this rule.
